cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with the theory of belief functions, which is a subfield of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The proposed LNS rule involves combining a large number of sources, which is a common problem in machine learning and data science (cs.LG and cs.DS). The paper also discusses the conflict between sources, which is a topic in social influence and opinion dynamics (cs.SI). Finally, the paper involves mathematical modeling and information theory, which are relevant to the subfield of information theory (cs.IT).
